title: Update Contact Us section with real phone and email details

requirements.text: Update the Contact Us section in ContactSection.tsx to replace the placeholder phone number with '9719774964' and the placeholder email address with 'mursaleensaifi14@gmail.com'. Also update the Footer component to reflect the same real contact details wherever phone or email are displayed.

quotes: Contact information is 9719774964 email id mursaleensaifi14@gmail.com

acceptanceCriteria: The Contact Us section displays the phone number '9719774964' in the phone contact info card.
The Contact Us section displays the email 'mursaleensaifi14@gmail.com' in the email contact info card.
The Footer component displays the same phone number '9719774964' and email 'mursaleensaifi14@gmail.com' in its contact details area.
No placeholder or dummy contact information remains visible anywhere on the page.

constraints: Do not change the layout, styling, or structure of the Contact Us section or Footer.
Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui/.
nonGoals: Adding a physical address or business hours.
Implementing backend form submission or email delivery.
Changes to any section other than ContactSection and Footer.
